Melee_01.synopsis: This guard is more aggressive than her counterpart. She's a thug/bouncer, and you're trying to stick your nose where you have no business.

Caster_01.synopsis: This mercenary is guarding the entrance to a supply of incredibly rare and explosive material. She's trying to strike a more reasonable tone than the other guard we speak to.

Melee_01_0.speaker: Yerle
Melee_01_0.context: NodeContext: Flat, stony-faced. You keep trying to talk to her and she has no interest.

Melee_01_1.speaker: Yerle
Melee_01_1.context: NodeContext: Each word bitten off. A serious threat and she's going to follow through on it if you push your luck again.

Melee_01_2.speaker: Yerle
Melee_01_2.text: Nothing for you in there, mate.

Melee_01_3.speaker: Yerle
Melee_01_3.context: NodeContext: Cutting you off before you can speak, utterly uninterested.

Caster_01_0.speaker: Erna
Caster_01_0.text: You don't want to go in there. Really.
Caster_01_0.context: NodeContext: Flat, more serious. The previous warning was an attempt to be friendly, but we're pushing our luck now and the humour's gone.

Caster_01_1.speaker: Erna
Caster_01_1.text: Wouldn't go in there, 'less you fancy blowing your bones all the way to Baldur's Gate.
Caster_01_1.context: NodeContext: Reasonable - making a joke of the fact that the whole temple could explode if you upset any of the smokepowder.
